com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.hls.playlist

Class HlsMasterPlaylist

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.hls.playlist.HlsPlaylist
      • com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.hls.playlist.HlsMasterPlaylist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.offline.FilterableManifest<HlsPlaylist>

    public final class HlsMasterPlaylist
extends HlsPlaylist
    Represents an HLS master playlist.

      • variants

        public final java.util.List<HlsMasterPlaylist.HlsUrl> variants
        The list of variants declared by the playlist.

      • audios

        public final java.util.List<HlsMasterPlaylist.HlsUrl> audios
        The list of demuxed audios declared by the playlist.

      • subtitles

        public final java.util.List<HlsMasterPlaylist.HlsUrl> subtitles
        The list of subtitles declared by the playlist.

      • muxedAudioFormat

        public final com.google.android.exoplayer2.Format muxedAudioFormat
        The format of the audio muxed in the variants. May be null if the playlist does not declare any muxed audio.

      • muxedCaptionFormats

        public final java.util.List<com.google.android.exoplayer2.Format> muxedCaptionFormats
        The format of the closed captions declared by the playlist. May be empty if the playlist explicitly declares no captions are available, or null if the playlist does not declare any captions information.

      • variableDefinitions

        public final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> variableDefinitions
        Contains variable definitions, as defined by the #EXT-X-DEFINE tag.

        Creates a playlist with a single variant.
        Parameters:
